entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 7:10 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
